readable.title: 3296124052_6f1d1c9f8d
readable.content: A cook steps back as flames leap from a pan in a kitchen . A man in a black shirt and jeans is backing away from a fire on a stove . an Asian man is cooking on dish that is on fire in a commercial style kitchen . A pan on the stove in flames , a cook with an intense expression on his face . A woman at a stove jumps back from the high flames of a pan .
